TcMenuPlugin.name: Control menu with UP and DOWN buttons
TcMenuPlugin.Description: Switches that represent up, down and OK controlled by switches library. These are fully debounced either pull up or pull down switches and can either be connected direct to Arduino or via an i2c expander.

Property.name: PullUp Logic
Property.desc: Enable this to use pull up logic, otherwise pull down

Property.name: Interrupt Switches
Property.desc: Enable this to use interrupts instead of polling for switches

Property.name: IoAbstractionRef for Switches
Property.desc: This allows you to provide an IoAbstractionRef if your input is on an IO expander

Property.name: Up Button Pin
Property.desc: The pin on which the UP button is connected

Property.name: Down Button Pin
Property.desc: The pin on which DOWN button is connected

Property.name: Left / Back Button Pin (-1 off)
Property.desc: Left or back button pin connection, or -1 for none

Property.name: Right / Next Button Pin (-1 off)
Property.desc: Right or Next button pin connection, or -1 for none

Property.name: OK Button Pin
Property.desc: The pin on which OK is connected
